abstract: Southern California football coach Steve Sarkisian apologizes later for his behavior and inappropriate language at team's Salute to Troy reception.
lead_paragraph: Southern California’s football coach, Steve Sarkisian, apologized Sunday for his behavior and inappropriate language at a team event the night before.

headline.main: Steve Sarkisian, U.S.C. Football Coach, Issues Apology
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | College Football; U.S.C. Coach Issues Apology

snippet: Southern California’s football coach, Steve Sarkisian, apologized Sunday for his behavior and inappropriate language at a team event the night before.
